hugs: Hugs isn't so great? Are you kidding me? When was the last time you saw a player with such age and wisdom with samus? Hugo puts the game in another level, and we will be blessed if we ever see a player with his age and passion for the game again. Mang0 breaks records. Armada breaks records. Hugs breaks his hip. You can keep your statistics. I prefer the years.
syrox: Syrox isn't so great? Are you kidding me? When was the last time you saw a player do everything hax$ does, a little slower? Syrox puts the game in another level, and we will be blessed if we ever see a player with his skill and ligament damage again. Mang0 breaks records. Armada breaks records. Hax$ breaks his hands. Syrox 3-0's S2J. You can keep your SoCal. I prefer Colorado.
baby mang0: Baby Mang0 isn't so great? Are you kidding me? When was the last time you saw a player with such an ability and movement with captain falcon? Baby Mang0 puts the game in another level, and we will be blessed if we ever see a player with his skill and passion for the game again. mang0 breaks records. Armada breaks records. Baby Mang0 breaks the rules. You can keep your statistics. I prefer the Dee Dah.

sheik: I am very mad. I drove all the way to CSU to play in a tournament, get stuck in traffic and lost against this retarded ass sheik. Down threw tech chase and wouldn't stop shino stalling I really cannot think straight right now. I offered to MM him for more than $20. Nope. I thought I would have made it out of pools if I knew how to fucking buffer roll. But they didn't even give me the frames to do it. Bullshit, just straight up bullshit. Probably will never go to a tournament that gay ass sheiks enter ever again. This definitely ruined my day.
